TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlInputRadioButton extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler
Public Class HtmlInputRadioButton Inherits HtmlInputControl Implements IPostBackDataHandler

summary.span: 允许对服务器上的 HTML 元素进行编程访问。

span.span: Allows programmatic access to the HTML element on the server.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用控件在网页上创建一个单选按钮。Use the control to create a radio button on a Web page. 控件不提供内置功能，以显示单选按钮的标题。The control does not provide built-in functionality to display a caption for the radio button. 若要创建标题，请在 Web 页上所需的位置使用文字文本。To create a caption, use literal text in the Web page at the desired location. 这可以确定标题相对于单选按钮的显示位置。This allows you to determine where the caption is displayed relative to the radio button. 例如，如果你想要的单选按钮右侧显示标题，则声明控件，后面加上的标题文本中，如以下代码所示。For example, if you want to display the caption on the right side of the radio button, declare an control, followed by the caption text, as shown in the following code. ``` Caption Text
``` 你可以选择将为数量，且相关联通过设置属性。You can optionally associate a quantity with the control by setting the property. 如果你有多个单选按钮并需要执行计算，基于所选内容，这非常有用。This is useful when you have multiple radio buttons and need to perform a calculation, based on the selection. 可以按指定的常见值一起分组控件你想要包括到该组中每个单选按钮的属性。 controls can be grouped together by specifying a common value for the property of each radio button you want to include in the group. > [!NOTE] > 当组可以一次选择控件组合在一起，只有一个单选按钮组中。When you group controls together, only one radio button in the group can be selected at a time. 若要确定是否控件被选定，测试属性。To determine whether the control is selected, test the property. 如果你有一组控件，你必须循环访问控件和测试分别控制每个属性。If you have a group of controls, you must iterate through the controls and test the property of each control individually. 控件提供事件时引发属性更改发往服务器之间的值。The control provides a event that is raised when the property changes values between posts to the server. 这允许你创建的自定义事件处理程序执行一组特定的说明进行操作时引发事件时，如数据验证。This allows you to create a custom event handler that performs a specific set of instructions when the event is raised, such as data validation. 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用要创建一组单选按钮控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to create a group of radio buttons. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputRadioButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputRadioButton Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputRadioButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputRadioButton Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

Public Sub New ()
public: HtmlInputRadioButton();

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||"单选"文字字符串。The "radio" literal string.| ## Examples [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputRadioButtonCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputRadioButtonCtor/CS/htmlinputradiobuttonctorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputRadioButtonCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputRadioButtonCtor/VB/htmlinputradiobuttonctorvb.aspx#1)]

.property instance bool Checked
Public Property Checked As Boolean
public: property bool Checked { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否选择了 控件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is selected.

value.span: 如果选择了 控件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control is selected; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定是否控件被选定。Use the property to determine whether the control is selected. 如果你有一组控件，你必须循环访问控件和测试分别控制每个属性。If you have a group of controls, you must iterate through the controls and test the property of each control individually. 你还可以使用此属性以编程方式指定控件是否处于选定状态。You can also use this property to programmatically specify whether the control is selected. 你可以分组控件组合在一起，通过指定的常见值你想要包括到该组中每个单选按钮控件的属性。You can group controls together by specifying a common value for the property of each radio button control you want to include in the group. > [!NOTE] > 当组可以一次选择控件，只有一个单选按钮组中。When you group controls, only one radio button in the group can be selected at a time. 所选控件的属性设置为`true`，而相同的属性设置为`false`组中的所有其他单选按钮。The property of the selected control is set to `true`, while the same property is set to `false` for all other radio buttons in the group. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来确定在组中的单选按钮处于选中状态。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine which radio button in the group is selected. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputRadioButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputRadioButton Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputRadioButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputRadioButton Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法检查以查看是否的回发值控件不同于以前的值，并且如果是这样，则返回`true`。The method checks to see whether the postback value of the control is different from its previous value, and if so, returns `true`. 主要由控件开发人员扩展功能的使用方法控件。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

summary.span: 获取或设置 类的实例关联的组的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the group that the instance of the class is associated with.

value.span: 类的实例所属的复选框控件的组。

span.span: The group of check box controls that the instance of the class is a member of.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 组合多个通过指定的常见值的控件你想要包括到该组中每个单选按钮的属性。Group multiple controls by specifying a common value for the property of each radio button you want to include in the group. 当组可以一次选择控件，只有一个单选按钮组中。When you group controls, only one radio button in the group can be selected at a time. 所选控件的属性设置为`true`，而相同的属性设置为`false`组中的所有其他单选按钮。The property of the selected control is set to `true`, while the same property is set to `false` for all other radio buttons in the group. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性进行分组多个控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to group multiple controls. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputRadioButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputRadioButton Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputRadioButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputRadioButton Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件并将 控件注册为需要回发处理的控件。

span.span: Raises the event and registers the control as one that requires postback handling.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 正好在呈现之前调用方法控件。The method is called just prior to rendering the control. 主要由控件开发人员扩展功能的使用方法控件。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法，以便它将添加`Title`中自定义属性服务器控件。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method so that it adds a `Title` attribute in a custom server control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlinputradiobutton_onprerendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlinputradiobutton_onprerendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlinputradiobutton_onprerender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlinputradiobutton_onprerender.vb#2)]

span.span: A that contains the event data.
Raises the event.

summary.span: 这使您得以在该事件引发时创建自定义事件处理程序。

span.span: This allows you to create a custom event handler when the event is raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时属性控件更改发往服务器之间的值。The event is raised when the property of the control changes values between posts to the server. 这允许你创建的自定义事件处理程序执行一组特定的 （如数据验证） 的说明进行操作时引发事件。This allows you to create a custom event handler that performs a specific set of instructions (such as data validation) when the event is raised. > [!NOTE] > 控件必须具有启用视图状态事件才能正常工作。The control must have view state enabled for the event to work correctly. 若要启用 Web 窗体页上的所有控件的视图状态，设置属性`true`。To enable view state for all controls on the Web Forms page, set the property to `true`. 你还可以通过设置启用的单个控件的视图状态属性`true`。You can also enable view state for an individual control by setting the property to `true`. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和代码的处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 自定义事件处理程序更新在网页上显示选中的单选按钮的值的标签。The custom event handler updates a label on the Web page to display the value of the selected radio button. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputRadioButton#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputRadioButton/CS/htmlinputradiobuttoncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputRadioButton#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputRadioButton/VB/htmlinputradiobuttonvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputRadioButtonServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputRadioButtonServerChange/CS/htmlinputradiobuttonserverclickcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputRadioButtonServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputRadioButtonServerChange/VB/htmlinputradiobuttonserverclickvb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void RaisePostDataChangedEvent() cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub RaisePostDataChangedEvent ()
protected: virtual void RaisePostDataChangedEvent();

summary.span: 调用 方法，以向 控件发出控件状态已更改的信息。

span.span: Calls the method to signal the control that the state of the control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要由控件开发人员扩展功能的使用方法控件。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

para.span: 在重写方法在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便正确引发事件。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that the event is correctly raised.

summary.span: 将 控件特性呈现给指定的 对象。

span.span: Renders the control attributes to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法写入属性的属性作为控制，然后调用基类的方法The method writes the property as an attribute of the control and then calls the base class's method 主要由控件开发人员扩展功能的使用方法控件。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法中的自定义的服务器控件，以便始终显示特定标题文本。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that specific title text is always displayed for the . [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonRenderAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonRenderAttributes/CS/custom_htmlinputradiobutton_renderattributescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonRenderAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonRenderAttributes/VB/custom_htmlinputradiobutton_renderattributesvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonRenderAttributes#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonRenderAttributes/CS/custom_htmlinputradiobutton_renderattributes.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonRenderAttributes#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonRenderAttributes/VB/custom_htmlinputradiobutton_renderattributes.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public event EventHandler ServerChange;
.event class System.EventHandler ServerChange
Public Custom Event ServerChange As EventHandler
public: event EventHandler ^ ServerChange;

summary.span: 当 控件的 属性值在两次服务器发送间更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property of the control changes between posts to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时属性控制发往服务器之间的值更改。The event is raised when the property of the control changes value between posts to the server. 这允许你创建的自定义事件处理程序执行一组特定的 （如数据验证） 的说明进行操作时引发事件。This allows you to create a custom event handler that performs a specific set of instructions (such as data validation) when the event is raised. > [!NOTE] > 控件必须具有启用视图状态事件才能正常工作。The control must have view state enabled for the event to work correctly. 若要启用 Web 窗体页上的所有控件的视图状态，设置属性`true`。To enable view state for all controls on the Web Forms page, set the property to `true`. 你还可以通过设置启用的单个控件的视图状态属性`true`。You can also enable view state for an individual control by setting the property to `true`. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和代码的处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 自定义事件处理程序更新在网页上显示选中的单选按钮的值的标签。The custom event handler updates a label on the Web page to display the value of the selected radio button. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputRadioButton#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputRadioButton/CS/htmlinputradiobuttoncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputRadioButton#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputRadioButton/VB/htmlinputradiobuttonvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputRadioButtonServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputRadioButtonServerChange/CS/htmlinputradiobuttonserverclickcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputRadioButtonServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputRadioButtonServerChange/VB/htmlinputradiobuttonserverclickvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置与 控件关联的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value associated with the control.
The value associated with the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定或确定与关联的值控件。Use the property to specify or determine the value associated with the control. 该值可以为任何你想要与控件关联的有效字符串。The value can be any valid string that you want to associate with the control. 如果你有多个单选按钮并需要执行计算基于所选内容，这非常有用。This is useful when you have multiple radio buttons and need to perform a calculation based on the selection. 例如，您可以表示不同的传送方法的单选按钮。For example, you can have radio buttons that represent different shipping methods. 你可以存储中的传送成本属性。You can store the shipping cost in the property. 当用户选择传送方法时，可以从此属性确定适当的传送量，并将其添加到总销售额中。When the user selects the shipping method, the appropriate shipping amount can be determined from this property and added to the sales total. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用相关联的描述属性控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to associate a description with the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputRadioButton#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputRadioButton/CS/htmlinputradiobuttoncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputRadioButton#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputRadioButton/VB/htmlinputradiobuttonvb.aspx#1)]
